# food-identifier

Identifies food in images with an Apollo Server service connected to OpenAI vision.

## Use

Copy env-example to .env and add your OpenAI API key to .env.

`node server.js`

Open http://localhost:4000/

Run an example query:

```
mutation RecognizeImage {
  recognizeImage(image: "data:image/webp;base64,") {
    name
    unit
    quantity
  }
}
```

## Roadmap

- TypeScript
- tests
